display_long_description:
Model ship lovers rejoice! This is a collection of six finely-detailed vessels for viewing at both model- and actual-size. Relax and enjoy the Zen-like experience that piloting small boats on liquid provides.  Pick them up for a closer look.  If you desire stimulation, try your hand at competing against a "ghost-ship" to capture the most buoys. For fun, try piloting them around inside a house, or even your own living-room via passthrough/mixed-reality.  Leisurely stroll their decks as they sail upon an ocean with dynamic day/night cycle. Each ship includes an "action" event while at sea, whereby mighty cannons fire, ship horns bellow, or the submarine dives.

Included Ships:
- Ocean liner: RMS Queen Mary
- English "race built" galleon: The Mermaid (fictional)
- Zumwalt class destroyer: USS Zumwalt (DDG-1000)
- Iowa class battleship: USS Iowa (BB-61)
- Research vessel: RV Calypso
- German submarine: U-boat Type VII-C/41 (U-659)

Designed for use with a single controller:
- Button A/X: change to next ship (long-press for previous)
- Button B/Y: change to next environment (long-press for previous)
- Trigger: move in direction controller is pointing.
- Grip: (model-scale) grab ship , (full-scale) activate action.
- Thumbstick: (model-scale) control ship, (full-scale) change-time & snap-turn
- Thumb button: (ship model) double speed, (submarine model) hold to dive, tap to surface
